snippet.title: What is Cash Drag for a VC fund?
snippet.description:
In this video, you are going to learn how cash drag can affect VC funds and what happens when the market is hot and the cash may be impacted.

00:00 Introduction
00:17 What is Cash Drag for VC Fund?
00:44 Why is it negative for a fund?
01:34 How Cash Drag becomes the enemy of VC funds
01:42 What happens when the market is hot
02:20 Conclusion

snippet.title: How to Store Money: Why You Should Transfer Funds to Your Bank Account
snippet.description:
In this video, you are going to receive advice on why you shouldn't leave money in your payment accounts, like Stripe, PayPal, etc.

00:00 Introduction
00:15 Why startups should not store cash in their payment accounts
00:48 Things to consider
00:51 Yield interest
01:12 Lack of insurance
01:37 Missing bank protection
02:10 Conclusion

***********************************

snippet.title: What to do when a Co-founder leaves?
snippet.description:
In this video, you are going to learn about the steps that need to be taken when a co-founder leaves.

00:00 Introduction
00:16 What to do when a co-founder leaves
00:44 How to put all founders on a vesting schedule
01:30 Consider agreements for mutual protection
01:57 Put a blanket assignment of intellectual property agreement
02:50 Do the final payments + PTO checks
05.10 Communicate the co-founder departure with the team
05:44 Conclusion

***********************************
